flags.title: Biometric Privacy Concerns
flags.retail: The project collects iris scans, raising serious privacy issues.
flags.analyst: While OpenAI-related, it lacks independent biometric audits.

flags.title: No Audit Report
flags.retail: Smart contract audits not published or verified.
flags.analyst: Despite high-profile backing, no audit PDF or audit dashboard is publicly available.
